long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Goyral Bulk Message is a comprehensive solution for efficient and personalized bulk messaging on the messaging platform. With its user-friendly interface and powerful features, it simplifies the process of broadcasting messages, sending text, attachments, polls, and personalized messages.

Key Features:

Broadcasting: Easily broadcast messages to multiple recipients simultaneously.

Send Text, Attachments, Polls: Send various types of content including text, attachments (such as images, videos, documents), and polls to engage your audience.

Send Personalized Messages: Tailor messages to individual recipients for a more personalized communication experience.

Upload Excel File: Conveniently upload Excel files containing recipient information for efficient message sending.

Save Message Templates: Save frequently used message texts as templates for quick and easy access.

Random Delay: Implement random delays in messaging to simulate natural conversation patterns and avoid triggering spam filters.

Play / Pause Messaging: Control the messaging process with the ability to play or pause message sending as needed.

Download Group and Chat Contacts: Download contacts from groups and individual chats for further analysis or management.

ChatBot: Integrate a ChatBot feature to automate responses and handle common queries.

ChatBot AI: Utilize advanced AI capabilities to enhance the ChatBot's functionality, providing intelligent and context-aware responses.
